A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Give me a buddy cop drama with Jar Jar and 15 yr old whiny Anakin\, and I would like it more than this trash. I thought Attack of the Clones was bottom of the barrel for SW\, but somehow Rian Johnson found a way to top that - namely by deconstructing everything fans enjoy about SW. \"Let the past die... kill it if you have to...\" Rian\, you successfully killed the joy many fans have found in the franchise for decades... so congrats? 1/2 star because Carrie Fisher was great. RIP.
